episodes.overview: After Bart gets bullied at the school dance, Marge convinces the town to pass anti-bullying legislation. Homer then gets arrested and sent to rehab for bullying Ned Flanders, only to subsequently leave rehab as a hero.

episodes.name: Mathlete's Feat
episodes.overview: When a modernized Springfield Elementary has a technical meltdown, Lisa transforms it into a Waldorf school. Meanwhile, Groundskeeper Willie becomes the coach of the mathletes.

episodes.name: Every Man's Dream
episodes.overview: Homer is diagnosed with narcolepsy, but instead of returning home with his prescription medication, he returns home drunk. He and Marge visit a marriage counselor and have a trial separation, during which Homer begins dating a 20-something.

episodes.name: Cue Detective
episodes.overview: Scotty Boom, a Chew Network super-chef, challenges Homer to a smoke-off. But when someone steals Homer’s secret weapon – a smoker he bought off a mysterious man at a BBQ shack – Lisa and Bart are on the case.

episodes.name: Puffless
episodes.overview: Upon learning that their father really died of lung cancer, Selma and Patty agree to quit smoking. When Selma relapses, an angry Patty moves in with Marge and Homer.

episodes.name: Halloween of Horror
episodes.overview: When Lisa becomes scared at the Krustyland Halloween Horror Night, Homer is forced to take down his Everscream Terrors decorations. Halloween pop-up employees seek vengeance on Homer for causing them to lose their jobs, and rob his house while Homer and Lisa hide out in the attic. Homer and Lisa light up their stored holiday decorations to attract attention and stand up to the intruders.

episodes.name: Treehouse of Horror XXVI
episodes.overview: In the annual fright fest Halloween episode, Sideshow Bob finally kills Bart, only to reanimate him; Homer wakes up with short-term memory loss; and Lisa, Bart, and Milhouse get super powers from radiation.

episodes.name: Friend with Benefit
episodes.overview: Lisa makes a new pal at school named Harper, whose internet billionaire father becomes buddies with a different Simpson: Homer. Soon, though, Lisa becomes worried that Harper is a little too entitled.

episodes.name: Lisa with an 'S'
episodes.overview: When Homer loses $5,000 at a poker game with Broadway legend Laney Fontaine, the only way he is able to settle the bet is if he loans Lisa to Laney for a month. Then, Laney turns Lisa into a show biz kid and Marge and Homer fear they made a mistake letting her go. So they head to New York to get her back.

episodes.name: Paths of Glory
episodes.overview: Lisa sets out to restore the tarnished reputation of Springfield’s first female inventor. To find her invention, she scours an abandoned asylum and a restaurant that caters to men. Bart joins Lisa at the asylum, stealing one of the homicidal patient’s notebooks, and bragging to the boys at school that he wrote the entries himself. This revelation causes Homer and Marge to believe he is a sociopath, which Bart decides to use to his advantage until things go too far.

episodes.name: Barthood
episodes.overview: Bart’s coming of age story a la “Boyhood” chronicles his life from six years old to his time as an accomplished young man. Along the way, his tense relationship with Homer, an overly uncaring version of himself, and Lisa, who overshadows him in every way possible, shape Bart more than he realizes.

episodes.name: The Girl Code
episodes.overview: After a photo Marge posts on social media gets Homer fired, he returns to the best job he ever had, a dishwasher at a Greek restaurant. This same post inspires Lisa to code an app that predicts the real-life consequences of anything you post online, only to create sentient artificial intelligence.

episodes.name: Teenage Mutant Milk-Caused Hurdles
episodes.overview: There is a new teacher at Springfield Elementary, and a captivated Bart tries everything to win her over. Meanwhile, Homer decides to buy a new brand of “milk,” which causes early puberty, both for Bart (augmenting his wooing powers) and Lisa (whose small bout with acne opens her up to the world of makeup and popularity).

episodes.name: Much Apu About Something
episodes.overview: Sanjay passes his stake in the Kwik-E-Mart to his millennial son, Jay, who turns it into a hip, health food market against Apu’s insistence on tradition. Bart, whom Homer had convinced to give up pranking, is called upon to return to his trickster life and take down the new store.

episodes.name: Love Is in the N2-O2-Ar-CO2-Ne-He-CH4
episodes.overview: Lonely Professor Frink uses science to turn himself into a man whom women find attractive. Then,  overwhelmed by the attention, he invents an algorithm to perfectly pair the lonely men and women of Springfield, realizing that scientific exploration is his true love. Meanwhile, Marge, Bart, and Lisa visit Grampa for Valentine's Day and try to rescue the old folks from a drug-induced hallucination that allows them to relive their happiest memories.

episodes.name: Gal of Constant Sorrow
episodes.overview: After Bart accidentally sends a sweet homeless woman's cart into the river, he allows her to live in his closet for a small fee. When Lisa discovers that the woman is an incredible folk singer, she offers her own closet and plans a concert, only to be disappointed by Hettie's surprising substance abuse and violent nature. Meanwhile Homer tries to prove he's handy, but accidentally traps the cat in the walls of the house.

episodes.name: Lisa the Veterinarian
episodes.overview: After performing CPR on a tased raccoon, Lisa discovers her calling to be veterinarian and becomes an intern at the local office, but learns a tough lesson when her neglected class hamster dies. Meanwhile, Marge moonlights as a crime scene cleaner for a little extra money, and the trauma of the gory scenes make her increasingly dead inside.

episodes.name: The Marge-ian Chronicles
episodes.overview: Not feeling unique, Lisa signs up for the Mars One Space Colony – to Marge’s dismay. Then, Marge hires Bart to go through the tryout process with Lisa to make her want to quit.

episodes.name: The Burns Cage
episodes.overview: After Smithers is crushed by Mr. Burns' lack of affection towards him, other characters attempt to find a boyfriend for him. Meanwhile, Milhouse competes against a new boy for the lead role in a school production of Casablanca, so he can act alongside his own unrequited love, Lisa.

episodes.name: How Lisa Got Her Marge Back
episodes.overview: After getting into an argument, Marge takes Lisa on a touristy trip to Capital City, where, after attending a musical, they meet the show’s star who reminds Lisa how lucky she is to have such a great mom. Meanwhile, Bart is frustrated that everyone expects his pranks, so he teams up with Maggie to trick people.

episodes.name: Fland Canyon
episodes.overview: Homer recalls a tense family vacation to the Grand Canyon with the Flanders family. At first, the Flanders’ perfection puts the families at odds, but when they get stranded and Ned and Bart go for help, the families finally bond.

episodes.name: To Courier with Love
episodes.overview: "The Simpsons are going to..." Paris (well, Homer and Marge are), but in order to be able to afford the trip, Homer has to smuggle an exotic snake into France so it can be made into a gourmet meal.

episodes.name: Simprovised
episodes.overview: After butchering a speech in front of all of his friends at work, Homer turns to improv comedy to gain back his confidence in his public speaking skills.  Meanwhile, Marge decides to rebuild Bart’s lackluster treehouse, but tensions rise when Bart questions her building skills. Also, in the episode’s last three minutes, Homer  appears LIVE for the first time on television (both for East and West Coast broadcasts) to answer fan questions.

episodes.name: Orange is the New Yellow
episodes.overview: Marge goes to prison for letting Bart play in a park unsupervised.

episodes.name: Monty Burns' Fleeing Circus
episodes.overview: When a fire levels Springfield, Mr. Burns agrees to the Simpsons' pleas that he fund the town's rebuilding, on the condition that he gets to put on a variety show.

episodes.name: Friends and Family
episodes.overview: Mr. Burns hires the Simpsons, except Homer, to be his virtual family; Homer becomes best friends with the girl next door.

episodes.name: The Town
episodes.overview: After Homer catches Bart rooting for Springfield’s football rival, the Boston Americans, he plans a family “hate-cation” trip to Boston in an attempt to show Bart that Boston is a terrible city.

episodes.name: Treehouse of Horror XXVII
episodes.overview: Better late than never, The Hunger Games come to Springfield!

episodes.name: Trust But Clarify
episodes.overview: Lisa and Bart investigate Krusty’s suspicious new "Krustaceans" candy. Meanwhile, Homer wants a promotion at the nuclear plant and asks Marge to help him dress the part, and news anchor Kent Brockman struggles to find his feet in the changing media world.

episodes.name: There Will Be Buds
episodes.overview: Homer gets roped into coaching the kids' lacrosse team with Milhouse's dad, Kirk, who is in desperate need of a friend. When Kirk gets too clingy, Homer vents about how much of a loser he is. Kirk overhears his rant and disappears, right when the team needs him most: the championship game.

episodes.name: Havana Wild Weekend
episodes.overview: When the Retirement Castle and the V.A. Hospital can’t solve Grampa’s health issues, the Simpsons decide to take a family trip to Cuba to get him cheap medical care.

episodes.name: Dad Behavior
episodes.overview: Homer finds a new app that makes his life much easier and outsources his father-son bonding. Meanwhile, Grampa finds that he is about to be a father again.

episodes.name: The Last Traction Hero
episodes.overview: A workplace accident leaves Homer in a cast, and in a position to sue Mr. Burns. This leaves Marge unfulfilled, so she turns to an unexpected source for romance. Meanwhile, Lisa is made "Bus Monitor" and tries to keep the peace.

episodes.name: The Nightmare After Krustmas
episodes.overview: Krusty tries to impress his daughter as they spend Christmas with the Simpsons. Meanwhile, Reverend Lovejoy seeks converts after church attendance plummets, and Maggie is haunted by a spooky Christmas toy.

episodes.name: Pork and Burns
episodes.overview: When Marge becomes obsessed with a Japanese style of living, the Simpsons must part with any item that no longer brings them joy. For Homer, this means finding a new home for the family pig. For Lisa, it means saying goodbye to her beloved sax

episodes.name: The Great Phatsby (1)
episodes.overview: Mr. Burns tries to relive his glory days and crosses paths with a mysterious music mogul. After being conned by him and reduced to bankruptcy, Mr. Burns seeks revenge on the Music Producer with the help of Homer, Bart, rapper Jazzy James and the mogul's ex-wife, Praline. Also, Lisa is courted by the richest kid in town, Smithers begins a perilous journey and Marge opens an obscure boutique store.

episodes.name: The Great Phatsby (2)
episodes.overview: Mr. Burns tries to relive his glory days and crosses paths with a mysterious music mogul. After being conned by him and reduced to bankruptcy, Mr. Burns seeks revenge on the Music Producer with the help of Homer, Bart, rapper Jazzy James and the mogul's ex-wife, Praline. Also, Lisa is courted by the richest kid in town, Smithers begins a perilous journey and Marge opens an obscure boutique store.

episodes.name: Fatzcarraldo
episodes.overview: All of the fast food restaurants in Springfield go healthy, forcing Homer to turn to the last bastion of greasy food for comfort.

episodes.name: The Cad and the Hat
episodes.overview: Bart deals with his guilt after betraying Lisa; Springfield is in awe of Homer when he is revealed to be a chess savant.

episodes.name: Kamp Krustier
episodes.overview: Bart and Lisa return home from Kamp Krustier early, interrupting Homer and Marge's romantic encounters; Bart and Lisa confront a source of trauma.

episodes.name: 22 for 30
episodes.overview: Bart goes from delinquent with detention to the star basketball player at Springfield Elementary. Lisa covers Bart’s success for the school paper, and Homer becomes the team’s coach. Things go awry when Bart gets involved with the mafia

episodes.name: A Father's Watch
episodes.overview: Marge turns to a series of parenting experts for advice when she becomes worried that Bart is destined for failure; Homer decides to open a trophy store; Grampa gives Bart a watch coveted by Homer.

episodes.name: The Caper Chase
episodes.overview: Disappointed in Yale, Mr. Burns decides to start his own for-profit university and Homer is hired as a professor

episodes.name: Looking for Mr. Goodbart
episodes.overview: Bart gets in trouble on Grandparents Day at school and is forced to hang out with Skinner's mother as punishment. After spending time with various grandmas in the neighborhood, he learns the benefits of hanging out with the elderly, but eventually recognizes the dangers of taking advantage of them. Meanwhile, Peekimon Get has taken over the town of Springfield.

episodes.name: Moho House
episodes.overview: Mr. Burns makes a bet with his old friend that nothing can break Homer and Marge apart. But that's where Moe comes in.

episodes.name: Dogtown
episodes.overview: After a successful animal rights campaign, all dogs in Springfield are allowed to go where they want and do what they want. Pack mentality quickly kicks in and the dogs of Springfield assert their dominance by threatening the people.

episodes.name: The Serfsons
episodes.overview: In a magical medieval world, Marge's mother is turned into an Ice Walker and the only way for Homer to afford the cure is to force Lisa to use illegal magic. When the King discovers this, he kidnaps Lisa, and Homer must lead a feudal uprising to save her.

episodes.name: Springfield Splendor
episodes.overview: Marge and Lisa turn Lisa’s sad experience into a successful graphic novel-turned-Broadway show, but they struggle with creative differences and ego.

episodes.name: Whistler's Father
episodes.overview: Homer discovers that Maggie is a whistling savant and launches her baby-celebrity career. Meanwhile, Marge impresses Fat Tony with her interior design taste, and he hires her to style his brothel.

episodes.name: Treehouse of Horror XXVIII
episodes.overview: Maggie becomes possessed by an ancient demon, Lisa discovers a creepy/perfect version of her family in an alternate universe and Homer cannibalizes himself.

episodes.name: Grampy Can Ya Hear Me
episodes.overview: Grampa gets a hearing aid and finally hears what everyone has been saying about him. Meanwhile, Mr. Skinner discovers that his mother has kept the ultimate secret from him.

episodes.name: The Old Blue Mayor She Ain't What She Used to Be
episodes.overview: Frustrated with the local government, Marge decides to run for Mayor. To win public support, she begins making Homer the butt of her jokes.

episodes.name: Singin' in the Lane
episodes.overview: Homer and the guys try helping Moe cheer up by getting their old bowling team back together again, but they soon face a team of arrogant millionaires.

episodes.name: Mr. Lisa's Opus
episodes.overview: As future Lisa writes her college application essay for Harvard, she recalls past disappointing birthdays that helped shape her.

episodes.name: Gone Boy
episodes.overview: When Bart goes missing, the town puts together a search party to find him. After most give up hope, Sideshow Bob manipulates Millhouse into revealing where Bart is hiding.

episodes.name: Haw-Haw Land
episodes.overview: When the Simpsons go to a STEM conference, Lisa falls for a crooning jazz pianist named Brendan. Meanwhile, Bart discovers that he has an affinity for chemistry

episodes.name: Frink Gets Testy
episodes.overview: Mr. Burns will build a doomsday ark after he believes that the end of the world is near when he sees an old Orson Welles show about Nostradamus. Meanwhile, Professor Frink comes up with a new way of testing everyone in Springfield after Burns wants a test to determine who should go on a spaceship with him.

episodes.name: Homer Is Where the Art Isn't
episodes.overview: When Homer is accused of stealing a million-dollar painting, only a detective from the 1970s can clear his name.

episodes.name: 3 Scenes Plus a Tag from a Marriage
episodes.overview: Homer and Marge recount the story of their transition from loving their life without kids to being miserable parents.

episodes.name: Fears of a Clown
episodes.overview: Everybody is now horrified of clowns after Bart's prank using clown masks, which also causes  Krusty to lose his job. He attempts a comeback as a dramatic actor in the play "The Salesman's Bad Day", with Llewellyn Sinclair as his director.

episodes.name: No Good Read Goes Unpunished
episodes.overview: In an attempt to bring the family together, Marge forces everyone to hand in their electronics and take a trip to a book store.

episodes.name: King Leer
episodes.overview: Homer and Marge follow Moe after the bar closes early and discover him and his father fighting. The Simpsons, after finding out that Moe has been excommunicated from his family for years, attempt to bring them back together.

episodes.name: Lisa Gets the Blues
episodes.overview: When the Simpsons' flight to Gainesville gets re-routed to New Orleans, Lisa is forced to face her failures, and regain her confidence as a jazz musician. Meanwhile, Bart is intrigued by the voodoo in Louisiana, and Homer is intrigued by the drinking.

episodes.name: Forgive and Regret
episodes.overview: Grampa makes a confession to Homer while on his deathbed. After his recovery, he comes to realize that this issue will not be easy to reconcile.

episodes.name: Left Behind
episodes.overview: Homer gets Flanders a job at the plant, and he soon learns that no good deed goes unpunished when Flanders starts to insist on carpools and demands more from Homer's work performance. Meanwhile, Marge feels as though their marriage has lost its spark.

episodes.name: Throw Grampa from the Dane
episodes.overview: The Simpsons go to Denmark so Grampa can benefit from its free health-care system.

episodes.name: Flanders' Ladder
episodes.overview: Bart falls into a coma after being struck by lightning.

episodes.name: Bart's Not Dead
episodes.overview: Bart takes a dare, and ends up in the hospital. To cover for himself and Homer, he says he went to Heaven and met Jesus. Christian producers offer the Simpsons a movie deal, which Homer takes. But Bart can't deal with the guilt and comes clean to Marge after the movie is finished.

episodes.name: Heartbreak Hotel
episodes.overview: Marge and Homer's marriage is tested when they travel to a tropical island to compete for a million dollars on Marge's favorite reality competition show.

episodes.name: My Way or the Highway to Heaven
episodes.overview: God and St. Peter contemplate what merits a soul getting into heaven, while citizens of Springfield remember their divine encounters.

episodes.name: Treehouse of Horror XXIX
episodes.overview: Homer wins an oyster-eating contest against the mythical Cthulhu, Springfield is overrun by plant body-snatchers, Lisa finally snaps and Mr. Burns opens a retirement home with some Jurassic upgrades.

episodes.name: Baby You Can't Drive My Car
episodes.overview: A self-driving car company comes to Springfield, poaching all of the power plant employees with their fun work environment.

episodes.name: From Russia Without Love
episodes.overview: On a mission to play hardcore pranks, Bart, Nelson and Milhouse get Moe a mail-order bride on the Dark Web.

episodes.name: Werking Mom
episodes.overview: Marge wants a job, and stumbles into becoming a plastic food storage container-selling drag queen. Meanwhile, Lisa tries to make the world better in the style of "Amelie"

episodes.name: Krusty the Clown
episodes.overview: Homer finds his calling as a TV recapper, but his harsh grading causes a brawl with Krusty. After almost killing Homer, Krusty hides out at a real circus, and finds happiness there.

episodes.name: Daddicus Finch
episodes.overview: Lisa and Homer's bond gets stronger when they start spending real quality time together, and Bart feels neglected. So Marge tries to help Homer balance his attention between the kids.

episodes.name: 'Tis the 30th Season
episodes.overview: After a failed Black Friday shopping spree, Marge is determined to fix Christmas; Homer and the kids surprise Marge with a vacation to a Florida resort.

episodes.name: Mad About the Toy
episodes.overview: When Marge and Homer leave Grampa to baby-sit the kids, some little green army men trigger a PTSD episode, sending the family on a journey to Grampa's past and the time period when he was a post-war toy model.

episodes.name: The Girl on the Bus
episodes.overview: When Lisa spots a new best friend from the window of the bus, she gets a taste of what life could be like with a different, more cultured family.

episodes.name: I'm Dancing as Fat as I Can
episodes.overview: Homer angers Marge by binging their favorite show without her, and has to pick up a new skill in order to make amends. Meanwhile, Bart prepares to compete in "Krusty's Holiday Trample".

episodes.name: The Clown Stays in the Picture
episodes.overview: Krusty reveals the untold story of his past in his movie "The Sands of Space". While working as personal assistants on the movie, Bart and Lisa learn about the early years of their parents' relationship.

episodes.name: 101 Mitigations
episodes.overview: Comic Book Guy sues Homer for joyriding in his car. Meanwhile, Guillermo del Toro saves Mr. Burns from his troubles with the law.

episodes.name: I Want You (She's So Heavy)
episodes.overview: When a romantic night ends in injury, Marge recovers by taking up kite boarding while Homer bonds with his hallucinated hernia; Lisa attempts to fix her parents' strained relationship by seeking advice from an unlikely source.

episodes.name: E My Sports
episodes.overview: As Bart begins to excel in video game competitions, Homer discovers a passion for coaching him; Lisa attempts to bring Homer back to reality, but the plan causes chaos.

episodes.name: Bart vs. Itchy & Scratchy
episodes.overview: Krusty releases an all-female reboot of “Itchy and Scratchy,” so Bart and his crew of all-male friends decide to boycott the show. After Bart’s friends turn on him for laughing at the reboot, Bart joins a woke group of sixth-grade girls who commit crimes against patriarchy.

episodes.name: Girl's in the Band
episodes.overview: Homer works extra shifts at the plant so Lisa can play in the Capitol City Philharmonic.

episodes.name: I'm Just a Girl Who Can't Say D'oh
episodes.overview: Marge becomes director of Springfield's local theater, armed with Lisa's script resembling "Hamilton"; Homer joins a baby class with Maggie, and he takes a liking to supervisor Chloe.

episodes.name: D'oh Canada
episodes.overview: Lisa is mistakenly given political asylum in Canada during a family trip to Niagara Falls.

episodes.name: Woo-Hoo Dunnit?
episodes.overview: The documentary crime series "Dateline: Springfield" goes in-depth to solve the case of Lisa’s missing college fund.

episodes.name: Crystal Blue-Haired Persuasion
episodes.overview: Marge starts a business selling healing crystals to the naive mothers of Springfield when Homer’s work cuts children’s health-care benefits, leading Marge to use the crystals as a cheaper solution for Bart’s ADD.

episodes.name: The Winter of Our Monetized Content
episodes.overview: When a video of Bart and Homer fighting goes viral, they begin a journey as social media celebrities; Lisa battles the school's new industrialized detention system.

episodes.name: Go Big or Go Homer
episodes.overview: Homer must supervise interns, among whom is a go-getter who asks Homer to be his mentor.

episodes.name: The Fat Blue Line
episodes.overview: During the San Castellanta street festival, much of the town finds their wallets have been pickpocketed; after the state investigator puts the wrong man in jail, Chief Wiggum sets out to catch the real criminal and show he's still up for police work.

episodes.name: Treehouse of Horror XXX
episodes.overview: The 666th episode of the Simpsons parodies the Omen and Stranger Things, not to mention a little Crazy Rich Aliens.

episodes.name: Gorillas on the Mast
episodes.overview: After a trip to Aquatraz Water Park, Lisa becomes determined to set free Springfield's most vicious animals in captivity. Meanwhile, Homer fulfills a lifelong dream of buying a boat, and quickly realizes boat ownership sucks.

episodes.name: Marge the Lumberjill
episodes.overview: When Marge realizes that everyone views her as boring, she takes up competitive lumber-jacking as a hobby (and has a real gift for it). The circuit of competitive timbersports takes her on a month-long retreat to Portland with her trainer, Paula, whom Homer worries is going to steal her away forever

episodes.name: Livin La Pura Vida
episodes.overview: The Simpsons join other Springfield families on the Van Houten's annual trip to Costa Rica, which they obviously can't afford. While there, Homer befriends Patty's new girlfriend, Evelyn, and Lisa tracks down the real reason the Van Houtens can go on this trip every year

episodes.name: Thanksgiving of Horror
episodes.overview: The Simpsons face various Thanksgiving nightmares, including the first Thanksgiving, an A.I. mishap and a dangerous space mission complicated by a sentient cranberry sauce.

episodes.name: Todd, Todd, Why Hast Thou Forsaken Me?
episodes.overview: Todd blames God for the death of his mother and rejects his faith, so Ned sends him to live with the Simpsons, hoping they can scare him into believing in God again.

episodes.name: Bobby: It's Cold Outside
episodes.overview: Sideshow Bob gets contracted as this year’s mall Santa. Meanwhile, someone is stealing all the Christmas packages off people’s front porches.

episodes.name: Hail to the Teeth
episodes.overview: Homer and Marge attend Artie Ziff’s wedding and become quite uncomfortable when they realize that his bride-to-be is a clone of Marge. Meanwhile, Lisa grapples with the misogynistic implications of the immediate popularity she receives after getting her new Invisalign braces.

episodes.name: The Miseducation of Lisa Simpson
episodes.overview: Marge recruits Chrissy Teigen and John Legend for an education-based proposal.

episodes.name: Frinkcoin
episodes.overview: Lisa decides to do an essay on Professor Frink just as the scientist invents a new cryptocurrency. When this makes him the richest man in Springfield, Mr. Burns sees red and he starts plotting against Frink in order to restore his former status, while Frink learns who his real friends are.

episodes.name: Bart the Bad Guy
episodes.overview: Bart accidentally sees a new superhero movie one month before its intended release, and uses his knowledge to terrorize the other fans. Two executive producers of the film attempt to prevent Bart from leaking any more news to the public.

episodes.name: Screenless
episodes.overview: When Marge implements a screen time limit for the family, she realizes that she is the one addicted.

episodes.name: Better Off Ned
episodes.overview: Bart bonds with Ned Flanders, which leaves Homer jealous, so he retaliates by mentoring Nelson Muntz; a heroic act by Homer makes Bart look up to him again.

episodes.name: Highway to Well
episodes.overview: When Maggie goes to preschool, Marge decides to get a job to pass the time and ends up working at an upscale weed dispensary; Homer decides to open his own dispensary that mimics a sketchy drug deal, putting their two businesses at odds.

episodes.name: The Incredible Lightness of Being a Baby
episodes.overview: Mr. Burns tasks Homer with swindling Cletus Spuckler out of his newfound helium fortune. Meanwhile, Maggie is reunited with Hudson from Playdate with Destiny again, only for Marge to tear them apart after his mother annoys her.

episodes.name: Warrin' Priests (1)
episodes.overview: Helen Lovejoy's request for a youth pastor is answered by Bode Wright, a charismatic young preacher from Michigan. When Bode quickly has the Springfield congregation enamored by his easy-going and liberal approach to religion, an outcast and suspicious Reverend Lovejoy decides to look into the newcomer's past.

episodes.name: Warrin' Priests (2)
episodes.overview: While Bode has won over most of Springfield, he finds one churchgoer he can't sway in Ned Flanders. Meanwhile in Michigan, Reverend Lovejoy finds the ammunition he needs to get rid of his replacement.

episodes.name: The Hateful Eight-Year-Olds
episodes.overview: After severing her sibling ties with Bart, Lisa attends a sleepover at her new friend Addy's house, only to discover that Addy's clique are a group of cruel snobby rich girls that taunt her. Meanwhile, Homer takes Marge on a sunset cruise for the evening and finds himself at odds with the boat's cover band.

episodes.name: The Way of the Dog
episodes.overview: Santa's Little Helper nips at Marge, causing the family to reflect on the difficult life that the dog led prior to being adopted by the family. They end up reuniting him with his mother to avoid having to euthanize him.

episodes.name: Undercover Burns
episodes.overview: Mr. Burns goes undercover as "Fred" at the nuclear power plant and becomes friends with Homer and the gang. Burns implements all sorts of amenities to improve his employees' lives, but a jealous Smithers plots to bring the old, bitter Burns back and destroy Fred.

episodes.name: I, Carumbus
episodes.overview: At a museum exhibit of Ancient Rome, Marge and Homer get into an argument about Homer's lack of ambition. They then imagine a Roman version of what would happen if Homer was more career-driven.

episodes.name: Now Museum, Now You Don't
episodes.overview: Lisa stays home from school to explore the wonders of Western art. She appears as Lisanardo, while Bart takes the shape of a French impressionist, Homer and Marge as Diego Rivera and Frida Kahlo, and Maggie as a warrior Cupid.

episodes.name: Treehouse of Horror XXXI
episodes.overview: The 31st annual Simpsons Halloween special includes a frightening look at the 2020 election, parodies of Toy Story and Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse and a 9th birthday Lisa just can't get over.

episodes.name: The 7 Beer Itch
episodes.overview: Homer is tempted by a British femme fatale while Marge and the kids are on a seaside vacation.

episodes.name: Podcast News
episodes.overview: Grampa Simpson is accused of a crime; Kent Brockman questions his career.

episodes.name: Three Dreams Denied
episodes.overview: Bart becomes a voice-over actor; Comic Book Guy is humiliated at Comic-Con; Lisa is set up for a fall.

episodes.name: The Road to Cincinnati
episodes.overview: Odd couple Skinner and Chalmers embark on an 800-mile car ride to Cincinnati to attend an administrator's convention - but can they reach their destination without killing each other first?

episodes.name: Sorry Not Sorry
episodes.overview: Lisa calls her teacher, Ms. Hoover, a hack and refuses to apologize. Then, she learns Ms. Hoover's private pain.

episodes.name: A Springfield Summer Christmas for Christmas
episodes.overview: A cable channel films a Christmas movie in Springfield and Skinner falls in love.

episodes.name: The Dad Feelings Limited
episodes.overview: Comic Book Guy and his wife Kumiko debate about having a baby and we learn about his awesome origin story.

episodes.name: Diary Queen
episodes.overview: Bart finds his old teacher's diary and learns a surprising secret. Then, Lisa discovers an even bigger surprise.

episodes.name: Wad Goals
episodes.overview: Bart becomes a successful caddy, but Marge worries it is ruining his character.

episodes.name: Yokel Hero
episodes.overview: Cletus becomes a singing sensation, while Homer becomes a new man. Then, Cletus turns on his fans, ruining everything.

episodes.name: Do Pizza Bots Dream of Electric Guitars
episodes.overview: Homer tries to reunite a mechanical band from his youth, but film and TV creator J.J. Abrams gets ahold of them first.

episodes.name: Manger Things
episodes.overview: A secret of Flanders' Past and a never-before-seen room of the Simpson house are shown off.

episodes.name: Uncut Femmes
episodes.overview: It is discovered that Chief Wiggum's wife is more than she seems. Meanwhile, Marge takes part in a jewel heist.

episodes.name: Burger Kings
episodes.overview: Mr. Burns gets into the plant-based burger business. Lisa refuses to believe he's up to no good.

episodes.name: Panic on the Streets of Springfield
episodes.overview: Lisa gets a new imaginary friend - a depressed British singer from the 1980s. Meanwhile, Homer becomes a truck guy.

episodes.name: Mother and Child Reunion
episodes.overview: Lisa makes a shocking college decision, wounding Marge. It leads to a very surprising place.

episodes.name: The Man from G.R.A.M.P.A.
episodes.overview: A British secret agent comes to Springfield in search of a Russian spy.

episodes.name: The Last Barfighter
episodes.overview: After Moe breaks their most sacred rule, a secret society of bartenders seeks ultimate vengeance on Homer and his friends.

episodes.name: The Star of the Backstage
episodes.overview: A musical comes to life in Springfield as Marge stages a revival of her beloved high school show - but her wonderful memories are threatened by the return of a rival from the past.

episodes.name: Bart's in Jail
episodes.overview: When Grampa falls victim to a phone scammer, the Simpsons set out on a mission of vengeance to get his money back.

episodes.name: Treehouse of Horror XXXII
episodes.overview: The 32nd annual Simpsons Halloween special includes a spoof of "Parasite" and a segment where Bambi gets his revenge.

episodes.name: The Wayz We Were
episodes.overview: Evergreen Terrace is overrun with traffic and Moe has a fateful choice to make.

episodes.name: Lisa's Belly
episodes.overview: Marge puts a hurtful word in Lisa's brain and Bart gets swole.

episodes.name: A Serious Flanders (1)
episodes.overview: When a ruthless debt collector come to Springfield, Homer and Ned's lives are sucked into the artificial world of prestige TV.

episodes.name: A Serious Flanders (2)
episodes.overview: Things for Ned and Homer go from bad to gosh-darn worse in the stunning conclusion of this 'Simpflix' prestige crime thriller.

episodes.name: Portrait of a Lackey on Fire
episodes.overview: Smithers finds true love with a famous fashion designer, but will his new relationship destroy Springfield?

episodes.name: Mothers and Other Strangers
episodes.overview: In a flashback, Homer goes on a road trip with his father to find his mother.

episodes.name: A Made Maggie
episodes.overview: Fat Tony becomes Godfather to Maggie Simpson.

episodes.name: The Longest Marge
episodes.overview: Marge and Mr. Burns fight for the soul of a brash young football prodigy.

episodes.name: Pixelated and Afraid
episodes.overview: When Homer and Marge are lost in an icy wilderness, they must push themselves to their limits to survive.

episodes.name: Boyz N the Highlands
episodes.overview: Bart, Martin and the bullies run for their lives when a weekend in the wilderness takes a dark turn.

episodes.name: You Won't Believe What This Episode Is About -- Act Three Will Shock You!
episodes.overview: Homer becomes a pariah when footage of him allegedly leaving Santa's Little Helper in a hot car goes viral.

episodes.name: Bart the Cool Kid
episodes.overview: When Bart befriends a famous kid influencer who owns an ultra-cool skate wear brand, Homer leads a rebellion of loser dads against them.

episodes.name: Pretty Whittle Liar
episodes.overview: Cletus discovers that his wife Brandine has been hiding a secret love ... of learning.

episodes.name: The Sound of Bleeding Gums
episodes.overview: Lisa meets the son of the late musician Bleeding Gums Murphy - and attempts to improve his life.

episodes.name: My Octopus and a Teacher
episodes.overview: Bart can't control his feelings when he gets a new teacher. Meanwhile, Lisa befriends an octopus.

episodes.name: Girls Just Shauna Have Fun
episodes.overview: When Lisa joins the high school marching band, she finds an unlikely mentor in Shauna Chalmers. Meanwhile, Homer becomes a craft beer brewer.

episodes.name: Marge the Meanie
episodes.overview: A surprise from Marge's past has her bonding with Bart and terrifying Homer.

episodes.name: Meat Is Murder
episodes.overview: Grampa finds himself in a pickle when his hidden hamburger past comes back to "ketchup" with him.

episodes.name: Poorhouse Rock
episodes.overview: After Bart humiliates him at church, Homer finally teaches his son to admire his dad - until a visit from a magical, singing janitor changes everything they thought they knew.

episodes.name: Habeas Tortoise
episodes.overview: After Homer humiliates himself in a town meeting, he looks for acceptance in an internet group hunting for a missing tortoise but finds something much more sinister.

episodes.name: One Angry Lisa
episodes.overview: Lisa gets called for jury duty while Marge becomes obsessed with her exercise bike.

episodes.name: Lisa the Boy Scout
episodes.overview: When the Boy Explorers become co-ed, Bart and Lisa vow to "out scout" each other at the annual jamboree.

episodes.name: The King of Nice
episodes.overview: Marge is hired as a segment producer on Krusty's new daytime talk show. But her initial excitement about the job fades when she discovers what an endless nightmare it is!

episodes.name: Not It
episodes.overview: Homer and his teenaged friends are pursued by a killer clown in a spoof of Stephen King's novel "It".

episodes.name: Treehouse of Horror XXXIII
episodes.overview: In a book-themed trilogy, Marge's resentment takes monstrous form, Lisa tries to save the planet through murder and Homer learns he's not the man he thought he was.

episodes.name: From Beer to Paternity
episodes.overview: When Homer becomes Duffman's girl-dad hero, they go on a road trip with Lisa that threatens to expose Homer's terrible parenting.

episodes.name: Step Brother from the Same Planet
episodes.overview: Homer is stunned by his feelings of rage and resentment when Grampa becomes a doting stepfather to his girlfriend's quirky young son. Lisa and Bart throw the ultimate slumber party.

episodes.name: When Nelson Met Lisa
episodes.overview: A future tale of the will-they-won't-they-I-guess-they-won't-maybe-they-will of Springfield's most unlikely couple.

episodes.name: Game Done Changed
episodes.overview: When Bart discovers a profitable glitch in an online game, he ropes Principal Skinner into his lucrative criminal enterprise. Marge and Maggie discover paradise.

episodes.name: Top Goon
episodes.overview: Coach Moe recruits the world's greatest brawlers to teach Nelson the art of hockey goonery.

episodes.name: My Life as a Vlog
episodes.overview: Through a series of YouTube recommended videos, the story of the rise and fall of The Simpson Family Vlog is revealed.

episodes.name: The Many Saints of Springfield
episodes.overview: When Ned Flanders falls on hard times, Fat Tony makes him an offer he can't refuse.

episodes.name: Carl Carlson Rides Again
episodes.overview: When Carl is smitten by a beautiful woman, he looks into the roots of his own identity by discovering the origins of a mysterious rodeo buckle.

episodes.name: Bartless
episodes.overview: When Bart's latest prank leads to chaos at Springfield Elementary, Marge and Homer dream of a world in which their rambunctious son was never a Simpson.

episodes.name: Hostile Kirk Place
episodes.overview: When Milhouse's Dad, Kirk, takes exception to a school history lesson that paints one of his ancestors in a bad light, Kirk goes on a crusade to censor and control the school curriculum -- a crusade that Homer co-opts for fun and profit.

episodes.name: Pin Gal
episodes.overview: A mysterious figure from Marge's past returns to coach her for a bowling tournament.

episodes.name: Fan-ily Feud
episodes.overview: Homer publicly disparages a pop singer and faces the ire of her vindictive and highly organized fan army.

episodes.name: Write Off This Episode
episodes.overview: When Marge and Lisa start a charity together, Marge is seduced by the money and prestige of Big Charity fundraising.

episodes.name: The Very Hungry Caterpillars
episodes.overview: When a plague of insects shuts down Springfield, the Simpsons face their greatest challenge yet… spending time in lockdown with each other.

episodes.name: Clown v. Board of Education
episodes.overview: Krusty opens a school for clowning, and it becomes the most successful thing he's ever done.

episodes.name: Homer's Adventures Through the Windshield Glass
episodes.overview: Time stands still after Homer crashes his car and flies through the windshield. As his life flashes before his eyes, a magical friend helps Homer learn the secret truth about his marriage.

episodes.name: Homer's Crossing
episodes.overview: Feeling worthless at work, Homer volunteers to be a school crossing guard. But when his safety squad receives too much funding, the crossing guards become a force to be feared.

episodes.name: A Mid-Childhood Night's Dream
episodes.overview: Marge feels an overwhelming dread of the empty nest.

episodes.name: McMansion & Wife
episodes.overview: When a new neighbor showers him with kindness, Homer thinks he's being tricked into buying a sports car at the dealership where the neighbor works - but the truth turns out to be even more sinister; Lisa neutralizes Nelson after he goes on a bullying spree.

episodes.name: Thirst Trap: A Corporate Love Story
episodes.overview: In a parody documentary, a young college-dropout CEO embraces the Silicon Valley "fake it until you make it" philosophy and bewitches Mr. Burns into funding her highly dubious dream project.

episodes.name: Treehouse of Horror XXXIV
episodes.overview: After Bart is turned into an NFT, Marge fights though the blockchain to rescue her son. To track down a gruesome serial killer, Lisa turns to a murderer from her past. An outbreak transforms Springfielders into a plague of lazy, beer-loving oafs.

episodes.name: Iron Marge
episodes.overview: When Marge's heart is broken by a bad birthday present, Bart and Lisa must dig into their mom's past to show that they really know her. Homer becomes a neighborhood fear-monger.

episodes.name: It's a Blunderful Life
episodes.overview: Lisa recounts the story of how Homer was scapegoated for a power outage that plunged Springfield into darkness days before Thanksgiving.

episodes.name: AE Bonny Romance
episodes.overview: When Groundskeeper Willie is kidnapped to Scotland, Bart and the Simpsons follow - only to discover that what awaits is Homer's worst nightmare.

episodes.name: Murder, She Boat
episodes.overview: Lisa must solve a closed-boat mystery when Comic Book Guy's million-dollar action figure is "murdered" on a pop culture cruise.

episodes.name: Do the Wrong Thing
episodes.overview: Homer and Bart become kings of the blue-collar sports circuit, but Marge suspects something dishonest at the core of their father-son bond.

episodes.name: Frinkenstein's Monster
episodes.overview: Professor Frink secretly helps Homer, through a zoom interview, land a high-level position at a state-of-the-art nuclear plant in Shelbyville. But since Homer lacks the skills to actually perform the job, Frink must monitor Homer's work situation remotely and dictate his every word... causing Frink to fear he's created a monster.

episodes.name: Lisa Gets an F1
episodes.overview: Lisa feels a need for speed as well a need for control of her anxiety when she becomes a pro kid go-cart racer.

episodes.name: Clan of the Cave Mom
episodes.overview: A parenting disagreement between Marge and Luann Van Houten escalates into a life-or-death struggle for survival.

episodes.name: Night of the Living Wage
episodes.overview: Marge gets a job in a high-pressure ghost kitchen, but when she tries to start a union, she gets more than she (collectively) bargained for.

episodes.name: Cremains of the Day
episodes.overview: When someone in Homer's life passes away, he and guys from Moe's go on a road trip to scatter the ashes... but will their friendship die as well?

episodes.name: The Tell-Tale Pants
episodes.overview: Marge comes upon a surprising windfall and, angry with Homer, spends it secretly on herself.

episodes.name: The Tipping Point
episodes.overview: Homer loses his mind over tipping culture run amok.

episodes.name: Bart's Brain
episodes.overview: Bart makes a new friend.

episodes.name: The Past and the Furious
episodes.overview: Lisa travels back in time to 1923 and discovers that the Springfield Mini Moose, once key to the town’s ecosystem, were driven to extinction in 1925. Teaming up with young Monty Burns, Lisa works to save the moose, but her actions unintentionally shape his future as a ruthless tycoon.

episodes.name: Yellow Planet
episodes.overview: The Simpsons explore Earth in a Nat Geo-style mockumentary.

episodes.name: Bart's Birthday
episodes.overview: Bart celebrates the most shocking birthday party of his entire life — one that might just change everyone in Springfield forever.

episodes.name: The Yellow Lotus
episodes.overview: The Simpsons encounter death on vacation at a high-end resort.

episodes.name: Desperately Seeking Lisa
episodes.overview: Lisa has a blazing misadventure in the dark world of Capital City's downtown art scene.

episodes.name: Shoddy Heat
episodes.overview: An unearthed corpse opens up a cold case from Springfield in the 1980s… as well as a steamy relationship between young Grampa and Agnes Skinner.

episodes.name: Treehouse of Horror XXXV
episodes.overview: Giant monsters created by political rage threaten to tear the town apart, a Victorian Mr. Burns is jump-scared on Thanksgiving by the ghosts of his abused workers, and Homer bonds with a pair of extra-terrestrial jeans in an unforgettable stop-motion adventure that can only be called… Denim.

episodes.name: Women in Shorts
episodes.overview: Girls just want to have funny.

episodes.name: Treehouse of Horror Presents: Simpsons Wicked This Way Comes
episodes.overview: A tattooed man at a mysterious night circus transports Lisa into three strange stories from the innocent 1950s, the chilling retro-present, and a brutalist future where prestige TV rules the world.

episodes.name: Convenience Airways
episodes.overview: The Simpsons are trapped on a flight with the most unruly passengers in America.

episodes.name: Homer and Her Sisters
episodes.overview: After a fight in an escape room, Krusty's truth-telling Aunt fixes Homer's relationship with Patty and Selma.

episodes.name: The Man Who Flew Too Much
episodes.overview: The new and improved Pin Pals travel to Capital City for their first ever state bowling championship.

episodes.name: Bottle Episode
episodes.overview: Marge and Smithers team up to become wine-forging Robin Hoods.

episodes.name: The Flandshees of Innersimpson
episodes.overview: Bart dips his toe into the world of celebrity DJ-ing, and Homer finally pushes Flanders too far.

episodes.name: The Last Man Expanding
episodes.overview: Springfield becomes hooked on a miracle weight loss drug... all except Homer.

episodes.name: P.S. I Hate You
episodes.overview: Marge's "nice-lady" reputation is on the line when an unknown blackmailer threatens to expose the angry woman she is inside.

episodes.name: Abe League of Their Moe
episodes.overview: After Grampa and Moe recruit a Macedonian slugger to play in Springfield, it strains their friendship and the very integrity of baseball.

episodes.name: Stew Lies
episodes.overview: Homer reinvigorates a celebrity chef's lost passion for food... with some help from the mob.

episodes.name: Full Heart, Empty Pool
episodes.overview: Homer and Grampa team up to create a new sport that rivals pickleball, until Homer kicks Grampa off the team.

episodes.name: Estranger Things
episodes.overview: When Bart & Lisa stop watching Itchy & Scratchy together, Marge fears that they'll start to drift apart... but she has no idea how bad things are about to get!

episodes.name: Thrifty Ways to Thieve Your Mother
episodes.overview: When Lisa starts wearing Marge's "vintage" clothes from the 90's, she's welcomed into the school's super-elite fashion club. But as they run out of retro looks, the funky fashionistas become obsessed with getting more... by hook or by crook.

episodes.name: Keep Chalm and Gary On
episodes.overview: Homer gets Superintendent Chalmers a job at the power plant. There, Chalmers discovers huge mutated snails that produce valuable slime launching his new career as a man-o-sphere guru.

episodes.name: Treehouse of Horror XXXVI
episodes.overview: Springfield is threatened by a mysterious killer monster emerging from the sewers, Krusty welcomes a demonic guest to his Halloween special, and the action moves a thousand years into the future in a post-apocalyptic, plastic version of the city.

episodes.name: Men Behaving Manly
episodes.overview: Springfield's men are in crisis.

episodes.name: Bad Boys... for Life?
episodes.overview: Is Bart Simpson truly a bad seed? Homer and Marge must find out once and for good.

episodes.name: Bart 'N' Frink
episodes.overview: When Bart becomes Professor Frink's lab assistant, the Simpsons are thrown into a world of tech billionaires determined to live forever, with the future of the internet at stake.

episodes.name: Sashes to Sashes
episodes.overview: Bart runs against Mayor Quimby's son for student council president, while Lisa learns troubling secrets about the Quimby clan... and about the Simpsons.

episodes.name: The Day of the Jack-Up
episodes.overview: After a mysterious buyer purchases every ticket for the KPOP concert Lisa wants to go to, the Simpsons have to figure out the identity of this evil ticket reseller. Or do they? (Yes, they do).

episodes.name: Aunt Misbehavin'
episodes.overview: Patty and Bart team up for the ultimate prank: getting Homer declared legally dead. To their chagrin, Homer loves being officially dead - which leads to Patty and Selma having a huge fight and Patty moving away to "Palm Springfield.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Coming to Skinner
episodes.overview: When Principal Skinner discovers that one of his students is a runaway who has been living in the school library, he has to take the snarky, difficult kid into his home and is forced into a role he never expected or wanted - being a parent.

episodes.name: Parahormonal Activity
episodes.overview: Set in the near future, Marge is competently coping with the hormonal onslaught hitting her now teenage kids when she's suddenly struck by a big life change of her own, leaving Homer as the last sane person in the house... or is he?

episodes.name: ¡The Fall Guy-Yi-Yi!
episodes.overview: Homer revitalizes Bumblebee Man's career when he becomes his secret stuntman. But how much punishment can a Stunt-Bee take before it starts to sting.

episodes.name: Seperance
episodes.overview: Homer's enthusiasm skills land him a job at a secretive company with a mind-altering agenda.

name: Disney+ Order
